title: A Very Good Question
author: VD
content_html:
Chuck Dixon’s Avalon Episode 5: A Very Good Question is now live on Webtoons.

In other news, Mutiny in Space by Rod Walker is the May Book of the Month and The Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri is the 4th book (May-June subscription) in the Castalia Library series. It will be a limited edition of 750.
content_text:
Chuck Dixon’s Avalon
Episode 5:
A Very Good Question
is now live on Webtoons.
In other news,

by Rod Walker is the May
Book of the Month
and
The Divine Comedy
by Dante Alighieri is the 4th book (
May-June subscription
) in the Castalia Library series. It will be a limited edition of 750.
